statements: UPDATE customer_support_data SET support_tickets = 10 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_support_data SET customer_calls = 5 WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE customer_support_data SET support_notes = 'Resolved issue' WHERE customer_id = 3;
UPDATE customer_support_data SET support_tickets = support_tickets + 1 WHERE customer_id = 100
UPDATE customer_support_data SET customer_calls = customer_calls + 1, support_notes = 'Resolved issue' WHERE customer_id = 101
UPDATE customer_support_data SET support_tickets = support_tickets - 1, customer_calls = customer_calls + 1 WHERE customer_id = 102
UPDATE customer_support_data SET issue_description = 'Expensive shipping cost' WHERE id = '945cc36b-4e27-4b28-94db-886725469dbb';
UPDATE crm_system_data SET account_balance = 1500 WHERE id = '46a55753-9e29-4043-bdec-1dd2d7871f1f';
UPDATE customer_support_data SET resolution = 'Refunded the shipping cost' WHERE id = '945cc36b-4e27-4b28-94db-886725469dbb';
UPDATE customer_support_data SET resolution = 'Resolved' WHERE customer_id = '456789' AND ticket_id = '123456';
UPDATE crm_system_data SET account_balance = 1500.00, subscription_status = true WHERE customer_id = '456789';
UPDATE customer_support_data SET issue_description = 'New issue', timestamp = '2022-08-01 10:15:00' WHERE customer_id = '123456' AND ticket_id = '654321';
UPDATE customer_support_data SET issue_description = 'Updated issue description' WHERE customer_id = 1 AND ticket_id = 101;
UPDATE crm_system_data SET customer_name = 'New Customer Name' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE customer_journey SET touchpoint_id = 2, touchpoint_description = 'Updated touchpoint description' WHERE customer_id = 3;
UPDATE customer_support_data SET issue_description = 'Resolved issue with payment processing' WHERE customer_id = 101 AND ticket_id = 205
UPDATE crm_system_data SET contact_number = '+1-123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 205
UPDATE customer_journey SET timestamp = NOW() WHERE customer_id = 101
UPDATE Customer SET customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;

UPDATE CRMContacts SET contact_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE contact_id = 201;
